long_description: The portable REI Comfort Low Armchair sits low to the ground and features multiple reclining positions for comfort at the beach, campground and outdoor concert. Multiple reclining positions let you get comfortable while you're reading a book, watching a concert or catching a quick nap. Headrest/lumbar pad slides up and down, allowing you to customize comfort; pad is attached to the chair, so it won't get lost. Steel tubing is strong and durable; powder coating keeps the steel frame looking nice for years of use. Mesh fabric offers comfortable support; won't collect water when left out in the rain. REI Comfort Low Armchair folds down flat and comes with an adjustable, clip-off carry strap for easy transport. Durable hardware withstands heavy-duty use.
